data.text: @PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook What are your thoughts on your colleagues, such as @BrandonLewis  who accept donations from people of ill repute…brcause they “admire” them. You smug, self serving rotter
@PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook Is this a scene from a Roald Dahl film?
@PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook Thought you were brilliant on question time last week. I stopped watching it because it was so rubbish. Kevin Phillips would be a good replacement for Bruce.

@PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook Taking money from Putin and signing books for Ukraine.
Most Tory thing ever.

@PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook @CforWomenUK Conservative women, reject the woke mantra of the hard-left that seeks to erase us women, and calls us ‘menstruators’. That seeks to rob us of our precious word ‘mother’. These people are not women, they are men suffering from a mental disorder. https://t.co/0wzUhlTyXG
@PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook @CforWomenUK If their answer is anything but based on fact and biology (adult human female) then they are saying’trans women are women’

@PennyMordaunt @cwowomen @GreaterTheBook @CforWomenUK We know that our single-sex spaces matter, for females at all our stages of life. For biological females, not for men pretending to be women, for whatever nefarious purpose they may have. Ask the CWO about our single sex spaces; and then ask them ‘what us a woman?’
